snippet: The Whig State Convention yesterday nominated the following ticket: For Governor..........G, W. Summers, of Kanawha. For Lieut, Governor....Samuel Watts, of Norfolk. For Attorney-General..Sidney S. Baxter....
lead_paragraph: The Whig State Convention yesterday nominated the following ticket: For Governor..........G, W. Summers, of Kanawha. For Lieut, Governor....Samuel Watts, of Norfolk. For Attorney-General..Sidney S. Baxter.
